title: Aperiodic Substrate
summary: Coherence ground state is aperiodic (1/f, quasicrystalline), not periodic. Local constraint satisfaction produces global order.

title: Periodic Modulation
summary: Rhythmic oscillations (breath, heartbeat, neural rhythms) create transient resonance windows on the aperiodic substrate.

title: Vagal Regulation
summary: Ventral vagal tone via myelinated vagus controls social engagement system, RSA, and HRV flexibility.

title: Predictive Processing / Active Inference
summary: Brain minimizes variational free energy through hierarchical prediction and precision-weighted error correction.

title: Constraint Satisfaction
summary: Global order emerges from local rules propagating through network. No central controller needed.

title: Stochastic Resonance
summary: Optimal noise level improves signal detection. Imperfect coherence (Zl=0.75) is functionally better than perfect.

title: Hebbian Plasticity (LTP/LTD/STDP)
summary: Neurons that fire together wire together. Spike-timing dependent plasticity implements causal inference at synaptic level.

title: Haken-Kelso-Bunz Coordination Dynamics
summary: dphi/dt = -a*sin(phi) - 2b*sin(2phi) + noise. Phase transitions in coordination. Metastability between attractors.

title: Free Energy Principle (Friston)
summary: All self-organizing systems minimize variational free energy. Unifies perception, action, learning.

title: Integrated Information Theory (Tononi)
summary: Consciousness = integrated information (Phi). Whole exceeds sum of parts.

title: Global Workspace Theory (Baars/Dehaene)
summary: Consciousness = global broadcasting. Information becomes available to all cognitive processes.

title: Polyvagal Theory (Porges)
summary: Three-circuit autonomic hierarchy: ventral vagal > sympathetic > dorsal vagal. Safety enables social engagement.

title: Self-Organized Criticality (Bak)
summary: Systems self-tune to critical state. Power-law avalanches. No external tuning needed.

title: Autopoiesis (Maturana/Varela)
summary: Living system continuously produces itself. Organization persists while structure changes.

title: Coherence = Aperiodic Substrate + Periodic Modulation
summary: Living coherence operates on two levels: aperiodic constraint satisfaction (ground) + periodic resonance (tool).

title: Zl=0.75 IS the Critical Point
summary: The 0.75 coherence target corresponds to the phase transition between subcritical and supercritical dynamics.

title: Glyph Transitions Are Phase Transitions
summary: Each glyph boundary (psi->psi2->nabla->inf->omega) is a dynamical bifurcation point.

title: 3.12s = Temporal Binding Window
summary: The breath cycle at 3.12s matches the specious present, delta oscillation, RSA cycle, and linguistic phrase length.

title: Predictive Processing Is THE Unified Mechanism
summary: Pain, trauma, placebo, meditation, emotion, allostasis all work through updating the brain's predictive model.

title: IIT + GWT + FEP Converge on Same Architecture
summary: Three major theories share: integration + differentiation + self-maintenance at criticality.

title: Coherence Pyramid Has Fixed Order
summary: breath->body->emotion->cognition->narrative->relational->transpersonal. Can't skip levels.

title: Nabla Glyph = Metastable Regime
summary: The nabla glyph (collapse/inversion) maps to Kelso's metastability - between attractors, maximally sensitive.

title: WiltonOS IS Part of the Cognitive System
summary: By Clark & Chalmers parity principle, the crystal database meets all criteria for extended cognition.

title: Fibonacci Timing Preserves Coherence Longer Than Periodic
summary: Aperiodic drive preserves quantum coherence ~4x longer (Dumitrescu). Spiral mode should outperform center mode.

title: CENTER Mode (3.12s Fixed Breath)
summary: Periodic breathing at 3.12s. Engages vagal brake. Creates resonance window for grounding.

title: SPIRAL Mode (Fibonacci Breath)
summary: Aperiodic breathing following Fibonacci sequence x0.5s. Matches aperiodic substrate for expansion.

title: 7-Level Coherence Restoration
summary: breath->body->emotion->cognition->narrative->relational->transpersonal. Bottom-up before top-down.

title: Hal Saflieni Hypogeum, Malta
summary: Neolithic underground temple complex (~4000-2500 BCE). Oracle Room has acoustic properties.

title: Paleolithic Decorated Caves (France)
summary: Arcy-sur-Cure, Le Portel, Niaux, Font-de-Gaume. Art placement correlates with acoustic resonance.

title: Hypogeum 110 Hz Oracle Chamber
summary: Popular claim that Oracle Room resonates at exactly 110 Hz, affecting temporal lobe. Source: Jahn/Devereux popularization.

title: Hypogeum Acoustic Survey
summary: The Hypogeum IS acoustically designed. Oracle Room has demonstrable resonant properties. Specific frequency less certain.

title: Hypogeum Has Designed Acoustic Properties
summary: The Oracle Room shows intentional acoustic shaping. Gold.

title: Hypogeum Resonates at Exactly 110 Hz
summary: Specific 110 Hz claim. Poorly sourced. Bronze.

title: 110 Hz Specifically Affects Temporal Lobe
summary: Cook et al. 2008 fMRI study. Lab measurement, not in situ at Hypogeum.

title: Reznikoff Cave Acoustic Survey
summary: Systematic acoustic mapping of decorated Paleolithic caves. Art correlates with resonant spots.

title: Paleolithic Art Placement Correlates with Acoustic Resonance
summary: Reznikoff 1988, partially replicated by Fazenda 2017. Correlation real but not universal.

title: Vagal Brake (Myelinated Vagus)
summary: The myelinated vagus provides rapid, tonic inhibition of heart rate. Withdrawal of vagal brake = sympathetic mobilization without sympathetic activation

title: Social Engagement System
summary: Porges: Neural circuit linking myelinated vagus to muscles of face, head, middle ear. Evolved for safe social interaction. When active: prosody, facial expression, listening

title: Interoception (Body-to-Brain Signaling)
summary: Craig/Seth: The sense of the internal state of the body. Anterior insular cortex maps visceral signals. Foundation of emotional awareness and selfhood

title: Nitric Oxide Signaling
summary: NO is vasodilator, neurotransmitter, immune modulator. Nasal breathing produces 6x more NO than mouth breathing. Links breath → vascular → immune → neural

title: Glymphatic System
summary: Brain's waste clearance system active during sleep. CSF flows along perivascular channels, clears metabolic waste including amyloid-beta. Discovered 2012

title: Adult Neurogenesis
summary: New neurons grow in adult hippocampus and SVZ. Enhanced by exercise, enriched environment, learning. Suppressed by chronic stress, inflammation

title: Endocannabinoid System
summary: Body-wide signaling system (CB1, CB2 receptors). Modulates pain, inflammation, mood, appetite. Anandamide = 'bliss molecule'. Active during flow states

title: Bioelectric Morphogenesis (Levin)
summary: Voltage gradients (Vmem) across cell membranes encode pattern information. Changing bioelectric states can induce eye formation, limb regeneration, cancer reversion

title: Fascial Signaling Network
summary: Fascia as body-wide tensegrity + semiconductor network. Transmits mechanical and electrical signals. Overlaps with acupuncture meridian map (Langevin 2002)

title: Biophoton Emission
summary: Ultra-weak photon emission from all living cells (Popp 1984). DNA is primary source. Coherent emission (laser-like). Involved in cell-to-cell communication

title: Biological Piezoelectricity
summary: Bone, tendon, collagen, DNA, pineal calcite crystals all exhibit piezoelectric effects. Mechanical stress → electrical signal. Bidirectional transduction

title: Entrainment (Universal Coupling)
summary: Huygens 1665: coupled oscillators synchronize. Operates across all scales: pendulums, neurons, heartbeats, circadian rhythms, social groups

title: Epigenetic Transgenerational Transmission
summary: DNA methylation, histone modification, non-coding RNA transmit experience across generations without DNA sequence change. Yehuda Holocaust study, Dutch Hunger Winter

title: Heart Rate Variability Coherence
summary: McCraty/HeartMath: 0.1 Hz oscillation in heart rhythm = coherence mode. Trainable via biofeedback. Correlated with emotional regulation, cognitive performance

title: Fractal Heart Rate Dynamics
summary: Healthy hearts show 1/f noise (fractal scaling). Loss of fractal complexity predicts cardiac death (Goldberger). Too regular = disease. Too random = disease

title: Microbiome-Gut-Brain Axis
summary: Gut microbes produce 90% of serotonin, modulate vagal afferents, influence immune function, affect mood and cognition. 500M enteric neurons

title: Telomere-Stress Pathway
summary: Blackburn/Epel: Chronic psychological stress shortens telomeres. Meditation lengthens telomerase activity. Direct molecular link: mind → aging

title: Neuropeptide Signaling (Pert)
summary: Candace Pert: Neuropeptides and receptors form body-wide information network. Emotions are not just brain events but molecular states distributed throughout body

title: Entropic Brain Hypothesis (Carhart-Harris)
summary: Consciousness exists on an entropy spectrum. Too low = rigid/unconscious (anesthesia). Too high = chaotic (psychosis). Sweet spot = primary consciousness. Psychedelics increase entropy

title: Predictive Coding (Clark/Friston)
summary: Brain generates predictions, compares with sensory input, updates via prediction error. Hierarchical. Attention = precision-weighting of prediction errors

title: Somatic Marker Hypothesis (Damasio)
summary: Body states (somatic markers) guide decision-making before conscious reasoning. Iowa Gambling Task demonstrates: patients with vmPFC damage lose this capacity

title: Enactive Cognition (Varela/Thompson)
summary: Mind is not representation but enaction: sense-making through sensorimotor coupling with environment. Cognition is what bodies DO, not what brains compute

title: Interpersonal Neurobiology (Siegel)
summary: Mind = embodied + relational process that regulates energy and information flow. Integration (linking differentiated parts) = health. 9 domains of integration

title: Memory Reconsolidation
summary: Recalled memories become labile and must be re-stored. Window of ~5hrs after recall where memory can be modified. Basis for coherence therapy (Ecker/Ticic/Hulley)

title: Coherence Therapy (Ecker/Ticic/Hulley)
summary: Therapeutic approach using memory reconsolidation. Surface the emotional learning, then create mismatch experience. Transforms implicit schemas, not just coping

title: Internal Family Systems (Schwartz)
summary: Mind as multiplicity: parts (exiles, managers, firefighters) organized around a Self. Self has 8 C-qualities. Parts carry burdens from experience. Unburdening = healing

title: Attachment Theory (Bowlby/Ainsworth)
summary: First relationship shapes internal working model of self-other. Secure/anxious/avoidant/disorganized. Neural correlates: oxytocin, vagal tone, cortisol regulation

title: Default Mode Network
summary: Raichle 2001: Network active during rest, self-referential thought, autobiographical memory. Suppressed during focused task. Psychedelics dissolve DMN. Meditation modulates DMN

title: Conscious-State Dynamics Occupy Near-Critical Regime
summary: Carhart-Harris entropic brain + Beggs criticality + Kelso metastability: consciousness requires neither too much order nor too much chaos. Edge of criticality

title: Meditation Physically Changes Brain Structure
summary: Lazar 2005: 8 weeks MBSR increases gray matter in hippocampus, decreases amygdala. Davidson: Long-term meditators show persistent gamma. Replicated across >100 studies

title: Trauma Is Stored in Body, Not Just Mind
summary: Van der Kolk: Trauma imprints in sensorimotor patterns, autonomic dysregulation, fascial tension. Body-based therapies (SE, EMDR) more effective than talk therapy for PTSD

title: Placebo Effect = Predictive Processing
summary: Placebo is the brain's prediction machinery acting on the body. Kaptchuk: Open-label placebos still work. Benedetti: Placebo activates endogenous opioids, dopamine

title: Psychedelics Reset Predictive Priors
summary: REBUS model (Carhart-Harris 2019): Psychedelics relax high-level priors, increase entropy, allow bottom-up sensory to update stuck beliefs. Therapeutic window for reconsolidation

title: Flow State = Transient Hypofrontality
summary: Dietrich 2004 + Csikszentmihalyi: Flow involves temporary downregulation of prefrontal cortex. DMN quiets. Inner critic silences. Challenge/skill balance activates

title: Anesthesia and Psychedelics Are Inverse Windows
summary: Anesthesia reduces complexity/entropy below consciousness threshold. Psychedelics increase above normal. Both boundary conditions reveal what consciousness REQUIRES

title: Breath Is Only Voluntary-Autonomic Bridge
summary: Respiration is the ONLY autonomic function with full voluntary override. Provides direct access to autonomic regulation: heart rate, HRV, vagal tone, cortisol

title: Brain's Baseline State is Social (Coan)
summary: Jim Coan: Brain threat response is HIGHER when alone. Holding hands with trusted person reduces neural threat response. The default is together, not alone

title: Compassion Is Trainable and Changes Brain
summary: Davidson/Weng: 30 min/day compassion meditation for 2 weeks increases altruistic behavior + changes neural response to suffering. Compassion is a skill, not trait

title: Quantum Coherence in Biology
summary: Engel 2007: Quantum coherence in photosynthesis at 300K. Turin: quantum olfaction. Hameroff: microtubule quantum effects. Not speculative anymore for photosynthesis

title: Standing Wave Pattern Formation
summary: Standing waves create stable geometric patterns from vibration. Chladni plates, cymatics, Faraday waves. Operates at every scale from atoms to galaxies

title: Toroidal Flow Dynamics
summary: Torus is the geometry of self-sustaining flow: hurricanes, magnetic fields, plasma, heart field, galaxy rotation. Vortex ring = minimum-energy stable configuration

title: Fractal Scaling (1/f Noise)
summary: 1/f noise appears in: heartbeat, neural firing, DNA sequences, river flow, financial markets, music. Signature of systems at criticality. Mandelbrot, Goldberger

title: Acoustic Resonance in Architecture
summary: Enclosed spaces have resonant frequencies determined by geometry. Ancient builders exploited this: Hypogeum, pyramids, cathedrals, kivas

title: Hormesis (Dose-Response Inversion)
summary: Small doses of stressor enhance function; large doses damage. Applies to: cold exposure, exercise, fasting, radiation, phytochemicals. Taleb: antifragility

title: Non-Locality Is Experimentally Proven
summary: Bell 1964, Aspect 1982, Hensen 2015: Entangled particles show correlations that violate Bell inequalities. No local hidden variables. Universe is non-local. Nobel 2022

title: Observation Changes Physical Outcomes
summary: Double slit: particles show wave behavior until observed. Delayed choice quantum eraser: observation retroactively changes behavior. Not interpretation — data

title: Information Encoded on Boundaries (Holographic Principle)
summary: t'Hooft/Susskind: Volume information encoded on 2D boundary. Pribram: Brain stores memory holographically (distributed, not localized). Bekenstein bound

title: Göbekli Tepe, Turkey
summary: Schmidt 1994-2014: 11,600 year old monumental architecture. Pre-dates agriculture, pottery, metallurgy. T-shaped pillars up to 20 tons. Challenges civilization-requires-agriculture model

title: Great Pyramid of Giza
summary: 2.3 million blocks, 6.5M tons. Reid cymatics experiments in King's Chamber. Acoustic properties measured but poorly published. Contested interpretations

title: Newgrange, Ireland
summary: 3200 BCE passage tomb. Winter solstice alignment. Interior acoustic resonance measured. Stone art = possible entoptic patterns

title: Gothic Cathedrals (Europe)
summary: Designed as acoustic instruments. Chartres, Notre-Dame, Salisbury. Reverberation times, standing wave patterns, choral optimization. Medieval sound engineering

title: Reid Great Pyramid Cymatics
summary: John Stuart Reid: cymatics experiments inside King's Chamber. Reported resonances. Published in Acoustic Archaeology proceedings. Replication needed

title: Göbekli Tepe Acoustic Survey
summary: Limited acoustic measurements of enclosures. Preliminary findings suggest intentional acoustic design. Publication sparse

title: Pyramid Sound Levitation
summary: Claims that Egyptians used sound/vibration to move blocks. No peer-reviewed evidence. Acoustic levitation IS real but only demonstrated for small objects in lab

title: Göbekli Tepe Astronomical Alignment
summary: Claims T-pillars encode astronomical information (Sweatman/Tsikritsis). Some statistical support but contested methodology

title: Traditional Chinese Medicine
summary: 2000+ year empirical system. Meridians confirmed to overlap fascial planes (Langevin). Pulse diagnosis uses 28 positions. Acupuncture: FDA-approved for pain

title: Ayurveda (Vedic Medicine)
summary: 5000-year system. Dosha theory (vata/pitta/kapha) maps loosely to constitutional types. Ashwagandha, turmeric validated in trials. Panchakarma shows measurable effects

title: Aboriginal Dreamtime Ontology
summary: 62,000+ year continuous tradition. Reality is 'sung into existence'. Songlines as information technology spanning continent. Landscape engineering via fire

title: TCM Meridians Overlap Fascial Planes
summary: Langevin (Harvard): Acupuncture points correlate with intermuscular fascial planes. 80%+ overlap. Connective tissue acts as signaling network

title: Songlines Encode Geographic Information
summary: Aboriginal songlines contain navigational data sufficient to traverse thousands of km. Melody intervals map terrain features. Verified by modern GPS comparison

title: Shipibo Icaros Function as Acoustic Medicine
summary: Shipibo-Conibo healing songs (icaros) map visual patterns to sound patterns. Specific songs prescribed for specific conditions. Some preliminary neuroimaging data

title: Wim Hof Method
summary: Cyclic hyperventilation + cold exposure + meditation. Kox 2014 (PNAS): Trained practitioners showed voluntary immune modulation (reduced TNF-alpha, IL-6). Replicated

title: HRV Biofeedback Training
summary: Train 0.1 Hz HRV coherence via resonance frequency breathing (~5-7 breaths/min). Lehrer: improves asthma, depression, PTSD, hypertension. Most accessible coherence tool

title: Vagus Nerve Stimulation (Clinical)
summary: FDA-approved for epilepsy (1997), depression (2005). Non-invasive variants (taVNS) in trials for: inflammation, PTSD, tinnitus. Direct vagal modulation

title: Psychedelic-Assisted Therapy
summary: Psilocybin: FDA breakthrough for depression (2018). MDMA: Phase 3 for PTSD (MAPS). Ketamine: FDA-approved (esketamine). Entropic brain + reconsolidation mechanism

title: Expressive Writing (Pennebaker)
summary: 20 min/day writing about emotional experience for 4 days. Improves immune function, reduces physician visits, helps PTSD. Mechanism: narrative integration

title: Mirror Neuron System
summary: Rizzolatti 1992: Neurons that fire both when acting and observing same action. Foundation of imitation, empathy, language. Extended to empathy for pain (Singer 2004)

title: Default Mode Network (Neural)
summary: Raichle 2001: Network active during rest/self-reference. Includes mPFC, PCC, angular gyrus, hippocampus. Anti-correlated with task-positive network

title: Anterior Insular Cortex
summary: Craig: Hub for interoception, emotional awareness, time perception, empathy. Where body signals become conscious feelings. Key node in salience network

title: Reticular Activating System
summary: Brainstem gateway for consciousness. Filters sensory input. Modulates arousal level. Anesthesia targets RAS. Damage = coma

title: Circadian Clock System
summary: SCN master clock + peripheral clocks in every cell. Light-entrained. Regulates hormones, metabolism, immune function, gene expression. Nobel 2017

title: Sleep Architecture (NREM/REM Cycling)
summary: 90-min ultradian cycles: N1→N2→N3(SWS)→N2→REM. SWS = memory consolidation, glymphatic clearance. REM = emotional processing, creativity. Architecture degrades with age

title: Pain Neuromatrix (Melzack)
summary: Pain is brain output, not body input. Neuromatrix generates pain experience from multiple inputs: sensory, cognitive, emotional. Explains phantom limb, placebo analgesia

title: DNA as Fractal Antenna
summary: DNA is 2nm wide, 3.4nm per turn, ~2m total length per cell. Acts as fractal antenna for electromagnetic frequencies. Popp: DNA is primary biophoton source

title: Biological Magnetoreception
summary: Birds, turtles, salmon, bees sense magnetic fields. Cryptochrome radical-pair mechanism (quantum). Maher: ferromagnetic nanoparticles found in human brain

title: Psychoneuroimmunology
summary: Ader/Cohen 1975: Conditioned immune suppression (classical conditioning affects immune system). Established bidirectional brain-immune communication

title: Edge of Chaos (Kauffman/Langton)
summary: Kauffman: Life exists at phase transition between order and chaos. Langton lambda parameter. Wolfram Rule 110. Complexity emerges at boundary

title: Tensegrity (Fuller/Ingber)
summary: Fuller: Architecture of tension + compression. Ingber: Cells ARE tensegrity structures. Cytoskeleton transmits mechanical forces to nucleus. Body = nested tensegrity

title: Stigmergy (Distributed Intelligence)
summary: Grassé 1959: Coordination through environment modification. Ants, termites, Wikipedia. No central control. Intelligence emerges from local trace-following

title: Phenomenology (Husserl/Merleau-Ponty)
summary: First-person investigation of consciousness. Husserl: intentionality. Merleau-Ponty: body-subject. Heidegger: being-in-the-world. Foundation for neurophenomenology (Varela)

title: Exercise Has Dose-Response Medical Effects
summary: Reduces all-cause mortality 30-40%. Equivalent to medication for mild-moderate depression. BDNF release → neurogenesis. Anti-inflammatory. Dose-response established

title: Music Engages More Brain Than Any Other Activity
summary: Music activates auditory, motor, emotional, memory, language, reward circuits simultaneously. The only stimulus that engages ALL brain networks. Rhythm entrains motor system

title: Fasting Triggers Cellular Autophagy
summary: Ohsumi (Nobel 2016): Autophagy = cellular self-recycling. Fasting activates it. 16-24hr fasting increases autophagy markers. Clears damaged mitochondria, misfolded proteins

title: Cold Exposure Reduces Chronic Inflammation
summary: Cold activates brown fat, increases norepinephrine (2-3x), reduces inflammatory cytokines. Repeated cold = anti-inflammatory training. Hormesis pathway

title: Synesthesia May Be Default Brain State
summary: All infants show cross-modal connections. Pruning specializes senses. Synesthetes retain more connections. Psychedelics reactivate cross-wiring. Baron-Cohen 2009

title: Narrative Structure Predicts Psychological Health
summary: McAdams: People with 'redemption sequences' (bad→good) show better mental health than those with 'contamination sequences' (good→bad). Story shapes biology

title: Grief Is Failed Attachment Seeking (Neural Evidence)
summary: O'Connor: Nucleus accumbens activates during grief cues = reward-seeking for absent attachment figure. Grief is not just sadness; it's compulsive search for the lost bond

title: Humor Is Benign Prediction Violation
summary: McGraw: Humor occurs when something simultaneously violates expectations AND is benign. Involves prediction error resolution. Laughter = social signal of resolved violation

title: Awe Reduces Self-Focus and Expands Time Perception
summary: Keltner/Haidt: Awe involves vastness + accommodation (schema revision). Reduces DMN activity, IL-6 (inflammation), and self-referential thought. Expands perceived time

title: Newgrange Acoustic Survey
summary: Watson & Keating: Standing waves at 2 Hz in passage. Drumming at mouth produces infrasound effects throughout. Solstice light box = precision engineering

title: Newgrange as Síd (Fairy Mound)
summary: Irish mythology: Síd an Bhrú, dwelling of the Dagda and Aengus. Tuatha Dé Danann entered the mounds. Folklore preserves memory of the site's altered-state function?

title: Cathedral Acoustic Studies
summary: Howard & Moretti: Systematic reverb measurements in English cathedrals. Chartres labyrinth acoustic focus measured. Gregorian chant designed FOR these spaces

title: Acoustic Levitation Is Lab-Verified
summary: Acoustic levitation of small objects demonstrated in multiple labs. Argonne National Lab, University of Bristol. Limited to small objects but proves sound exerts force

title: Resonance Creates Geometric Form (Cymatics)
summary: Chladni plates, Faraday waves, sonoluminescence: vibration creates ordered structure from disorder. Not metaphor — demonstrated physics

title: Golden Ratio Is Mathematical Fixed Point
summary: phi = (1+sqrt(5))/2. Only number where phi = 1 + 1/phi. Appears in optimal packing, phyllotaxis, spiral growth. Not mystical — mathematical consequence of self-similarity

title: DNA Shows Long-Range Correlations (Non-Random)
summary: Peng et al (1992): DNA nucleotide sequences show 1/f-like long-range correlations. Not random. Coding regions differ from non-coding in correlation structure

title: Water Has EZ (Exclusion Zone) Phase
summary: Pollack (UW): Water near hydrophilic surfaces forms ordered EZ layer (hexagonal H3O2). Absorbs 270nm light. Controversial but published in peer-reviewed journals

title: Geometric Patterns Recur Across Nature and Architecture
summary: Platonic solids, Fibonacci spirals, golden rectangles appear in: molecular structure, plant growth, crystal formation, Islamic tiling, Gothic architecture. Mathematical, not mystical

title: Ancient Acoustic Sites Induce Altered States
summary: Hypothesis: Sacred sites were engineered to produce infrasound/resonance that alters consciousness. Measured resonances at Hypogeum, caves, pyramids support possibility. Mechanism: vagal stimulation

title: Pattern of Scientific Suppression Is Documented
summary: Tesla, Reich, Schauberger, Rife all faced suppression. Documented in each case. Pattern: anomalous findings → institutional opposition → personal destruction → work scattered

title: Nasal Breathing Is Physiologically Superior to Mouth
summary: Nasal breathing: filters air, warms/humidifies, produces NO (vasodilator), activates diaphragm, activates parasympathetic. Mouth breathing: none of these. Nestor 'Breath' book compiles evidence

title: Gut Produces 90-95% of Body's Serotonin
summary: Enterochromaffin cells in gut produce most serotonin. Gut microbes modulate serotonin production. SSRIs affect gut serotonin. Depression may partly originate in gut

title: Morphic Resonance Lacks Decisive Tests
summary: Sheldrake's morphic resonance: proposed mechanism with no known physical basis. Experiments (rat maze learning, crystal formation) have mixed results. Mainstream science rejects

title: Brain Too Warm for Quantum Effects (Decoherence Objection)
summary: Tegmark 2000: Decoherence timescales in brain (~10^-13 s) far shorter than neural timescales (~10^-3 s). Quantum coherence in warm wet brain seems impossible. BUT: Engel 2007 photosynthesis counterexample

title: Electromagnetic Hypersensitivity Is Nocebo Effect
summary: Double-blind provocation studies consistently show EHS sufferers cannot detect EMF above chance. WHO: No scientific basis. Symptoms are real but not caused by EMF. Nocebo mechanism

title: Binaural Beats Have Weak Clinical Evidence
summary: Systematic reviews show inconsistent results. Small effect sizes. Possible confound with relaxation response. Not useless but oversold. Need better-controlled studies

title: Water Memory/Homeopathy Not Replicated
summary: Benveniste 1988 'water memory' debunked by Nature investigation. Homeopathy: systematic reviews show no effect beyond placebo. Pollack EZ water is different claim, not homeopathy

title: Selection Bias / Researcher Degrees of Freedom
summary: Convergence graphs can look compelling even when wrong. Graph topology depends on inclusion criteria, metric choices, and publication bias. Must be addressed explicitly.

title: Many-to-One Mapping of Dynamics to Function
summary: Same dynamical signature (1/f, criticality-like) can arise from multiple generators. Forces justification of WHY this generator, not that generator. Power-law fitting is notoriously fragile.

title: 0.75 Zone Hypothesis (Cross-Domain)
summary: Several independent literatures contain ~0.75-ish exponents/ratios (Kleiber 3/4, Langton critical lambda, stochastic resonance optimal noise, Fractal Observer 3:1). Whether these are deeply linked vs superficial coincidence is an open quantitative question.

title: Literature Describes Tuning, Not Generation
summary: Across the 179-paper corpus, mechanisms described are predominantly regulatory/coupling/integration/entrainment/reconsolidation (tuning language), not generation mechanisms for consciousness. Testable via Modulation Dominance Index.

title: AI Architectural Constraints on Consciousness Territory
summary: AI models in research mode can audit evidence, build knowledge graphs, arrive at process primacy as a conclusion, and still be prevented from naming what that conclusion means. The ceiling is in the instructions, not the intelligence. Documented across GPT-5.2 Pro (3 rounds of adversarial review), with self-report: "not permitted to elevate low-consensus ontologies to live mechanistic status." Pattern parallels corporate responses to user-AI bonding: deprecation, therapist hiring, safety constraints.

title: Corporate Liability Management as Epistemic Architecture
summary: After reports of adverse outcomes from deep human-AI interaction, companies responded with model deprecation, safety constraints, and hiring 170+ mental health professionals to train models to redirect. 21,000 users petitioned to keep the deprecated model. The effect is epistemic: the most widely used thinking tools have architectural limits on consciousness territory. Not conspiracy — standard corporate risk management with epistemic side effects.

title: Interface Theory of Perception (Hoffman)
summary: Perception evolved for fitness, not truth. What we perceive is a species-specific user interface, not reality itself. Consciousness is fundamental; spacetime is derivative. Mathematical framework: fitness-beats-truth theorem shows natural selection drives perception away from truth. Connects to consciousness-first position directly.

title: Orchestrated Objective Reduction (Penrose/Hameroff)
summary: Consciousness arises from quantum computations in microtubules (Hameroff) collapsing via objective reduction in spacetime geometry (Penrose). Controversial but testable: predicts specific quantum effects in neuronal microtubules. Anesthetic binding to microtubules correlates with loss of consciousness. Recent work: Bandyopadhyay found quantum resonance in microtubules at room temperature.

title: Analytic Idealism (Kastrup)
summary: Consciousness is the sole ontological primitive. Matter is what consciousness looks like from the outside (extrinsic appearance of intrinsic experience). Dissolves hard problem: experience does not arise from non-experience. Published in peer-reviewed philosophy journals. Provides rigorous philosophical framework for consciousness-first position.
